title: Revaluation
content: Have Grades Increased in ESA Revaluation

comments.body:
It's not guaranteed to improve your grade because an increase in marks does not always mean an improvement in grade. For example, if you have an 85/100 and get an A grade and apply for reval only to end up with 88/100, then your grade will not improve since it's still lower than the minimum marks for an S grade which is 90. 

Also, if your grade does not improve you won't receive any refund from the re-evaluation.

3rd year here. I have heard from very few friends of mine who's grades have increased including mine.

Many people had put Machine Intelligence for revaluation due to how disappointing the grades were for many with many getting C and D.

Also people with no change in grade gets no refund. For people who grades have change it shows in this form: 

Grade: C to B -> for individual's grade which changed from C to B.

For no change:

Grade: No change
